original_text: And Moses did as the Lord commanded him. He took Joshua and made him stand before Eleazar the priest and the whole congregation,
korean_text: 모세가 여호와께서 자기에게 명령하신 대로 하여 여호수아를 데려다가 제사장 엘르아살과 온 회중 앞에 세우고

sentences.original_text: And Moses did as the Lord commanded him.
sentences.korean_translation: 모세는 주께서 자기에게 명령하신 대로 행하였고

sentences.original_text: and made him stand before Eleazar the priest
